statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); worktree=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$worktree" && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); cost=$(printf '%.2f' $(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0')); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then context_tokens=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); else context_tokens=0; fi; context_window=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size'); if [ "$context_tokens" -gt 0 ] && [ "$context_window" -gt 0 ]; then context_pct=$((context_tokens * 100 / context_window)); else context_pct=0; fi; if [ "$context_tokens" -ge 1000 ]; then tokens_short="$((context_tokens / 1000))k"; else tokens_short="$context_tokens"; fi; if [ "$context_pct" -le 33 ]; then pct_color=$'\033[32m'; elif [ "$context_pct" -le 66 ]; then pct_color=$'\033[33m'; else pct_color=$'\033[31m'; fi; printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m · \033[35m%s\033[0m · \033[33m%s\033[0m · \033[34m%s\033[0m · %s%s%%\033[0m · \033[32m$%s\033[0m' "$model" "$(basename "$worktree")" "$branch" "$tokens_short" "$pct_color" "$context_pct" "$cost"
